results.title: Simvastatin addition to standard of care improves long-term survival in patients with cirrhosis after variceal bleed: An open label randomized controlled trial.
results.text_hl: Incidence of @DISEASE_Ascites @DISEASE_MESH:D001201 @@@ascites@@@(sub-distributional HR):0.60[0.39-0.92] and spontaneous @DISEASE_Peritonitis @DISEASE_MESH:D010538 @@@bacterial peritonitis@@@ (sHR:0.30[0.11-0.81] was lower in @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ arm. All cause decompensation(sHR:0.74[0.52-1.05]), rebleeding(sHR:0.87[0.57-1.34]), @<m>DISEASE_Hepatic_Encephalopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006501 @@@hepatic encephalopathy@@@(sHR:0.71[0.42-1.19) and @DISEASE_Acute_On_Chronic_Liver_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D065290 @@@acute-on-chronic liver-failure@@@ (sHR:0.65[0.39-1.10]) were comparable in both arms.
